title: The Writer's Almanac for Monday, December 13, 2021
description: "The Romans would never have found time to conquer the world if they had been obliged first to learn Latin." -- Heinrich Heine, born in Germany on this day in 1797.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: "The Romans would never have found time to conquer the world if they had been obliged first to learn Latin." -- Heinrich Heine, born in Germany on this day in 1797.
